raw_body:
BASIRI SARANACHANDRA SEMAGE. Dearly loved husband of Sunila,​ loving father of Lakmalee and Yohan,​ father-in-law of Beryl and Niroosha,​ loving seeya of Aaron,​ Joshua,​ Joel and Adalia,​ brother of Cecilia,​ Bianca (late),​ Swarnathilaka,​ Nanda (late),​ Quintas,​ Arunakanthi (late) and Thissa. Remains lie at Modern Funeral Parlour,​ Kandana for viewing on Friday 19th April from 5 p.m. – 10 p.m. and Saturday 20th April from 8 a.m. -2 p.m. Cortege leaves Parlour at 2 p.m. for cremation at Kapuwatta Crematorium) on April 20th.
025870
